casebody.data:
GEORGE MITCHELL, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. CHARLES W. WEST, Defendant and Appellant.

Before Barbour, Ch. J., Monell and Freedman, JJ.

Decided November 30, 1872. Appeal from a judgment in favor of plaintiff in an ac*566tion "brought for damages for the conversion of personal property. Albert Roberts, for appellant. F. F. Cornell, Jr., for respondent. Judgment affirmed.

Opinion by Freedman, J. Barbour, Ch. J., and Monell, J., concurred.
